name: AdviceoftheDay
0:
”Alexa Advice of the Day.”
”Alexa open Advice of the Day.”
”Alexa launch Advice of the Day.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: advice of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Every second can be a fresh one, start on positive note with fresh inspiring, motivational advices that can make a huge difference in your life. Ask Alexa for Advice of the Day as many times as you want to keep remind yourself that every second is a chance to do something great.

Just say, Alexa! Advice of the Day OR Alexa! Open Advice of the Day OR Alexa! Ask Advice of the Day OR Alexa! Tell Advice of the Day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
